name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. F. Geoffrey TOONDER v. Andrea M. TOONDER. Appeal of F. Geoffrey TOONDER

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order, 292 Pa. Super. 483, 433 A.2d 105, affirmed.
NIX and HUTCHINSON, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jack I. Kaufman, Allentown, for appellant.
John E. Roberts, Allentown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 753
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. F. Geoffrey TOONDER v. Andrea M. TOONDER. Appeal of F. Geoffrey TOONDER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 25, 1983.
Decided May 31, 1983.
Jack I. Kaufman, Allentown, for appellant.
John E. Roberts, Allentown, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott and zappala, jj.
